backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, study materials, assignments, exams, attendance, notifications, results, and announcements with accessâ€‘controlled CRUD-style functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping gallery-related features to the specific frontend files and components they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and shared element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, theme colors, display mode, and startup behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing app-wide section navigation, theming, layout, and shared UI components.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with icons that switches between seven main app sections.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top header showing branding and handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog component that prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Provides reusable UI components for loading skeletons, empty states, and error states.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines static branding info including school name, location, and logo path.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/auth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/dashboard.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving student profiles, exam results, and notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/discipline.ts: React Query hook for fetching attendance records for a student.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/education.ts: React Query hooks for study materials, assignments, exams, exam results, and announcements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables defining the school's theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardSc: Fetches user, student, exam, and notification data to render a personalized dashboard with login handling and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Attendance: Displays attendance records and summary for the logged-in student with login checks, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/BehaviorUp: Shows a login prompt if unauthenticated and otherwise displays an empty state for behavior updates.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Discipline: Renders a tabbed interface for rules, attendance, behavior updates, and guidelines sections within the discipline module.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Guidelines: Lists school guidelines and policies in card format with static descriptive content.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/RulesCodeS: Displays the school code of conduct and a list of rules using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/education/Announcemen: Shows details for a single teacher announcement with a back button.
Fetches and displays a list of announcements sorted by date with support for viewing individual announcement details.
frontend/src/pages/education/AssignmentD: Renders detailed information about a specific assignment, including due date, class, and description, with a back action.
frontend/src/pages/education/Assignments: Displays a filterable list of assignments with class selection and detail view navigation.
frontend/src/pages/education/EducationSc: Provides tabbed navigation for study materials, assignments, exams, and announcements.
Shows detailed exam information with subject, class, date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/education/ExamsList.t: Lists exams with class filtering, tabs for schedules/results, and navigation to exam details.
frontend/src/pages/education/StudyMateri: Displays detailed study material info including subject, description, class, and optional resource link.
Shows a filterable list of study materials and allows navigating to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen UI showing a hero banner and quick navigation links using branding and icons.
Defines the GalleryImage interface and exports a static list of gallery image metadata.
frontend/src/pages/images/ImagePreviewDi: Modal dialog for previewing a selected gallery image at large size.
frontend/src/pages/images/ImagesScreen.t: Renders a gallery grid of images with click-to-preview functionality.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularDetai: Displays detailed circular information including title, date, and message with a back button.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularsList: Shows a list of circular notices with placeholder data and opens a detail view when one is selected.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdateDe: Displays the full details of a selected event update with a back button.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdatesL: Lists event updates with placeholder data and opens a detail view on selection.
frontend/src/pages/notices/HolidayList.t: Displays a sorted list of holidays with dates and labels using placeholder data.
frontend/src/pages/notices/NoticesScreen: Top-level notices screen with tabs switching between circulars, holidays, and events.
frontend/src/pages/sports/AchievementsGa: Shows a gallery of sports achievements with images and titles.
frontend/src/pages/sports/ActivitiesFaci: Displays available sports activities and facilities with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/sports/FitnessTrainin: Shows weekly fitness and training schedules with activities and levels.
frontend/src/pages/sports/SportsScreen.t: Main sports screen providing tabs for activities, events, achievements, and fitness sections.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentEven: Displays detailed information for a selected tournament event with title, date, optional location, description, and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentsEve: Shows a list of placeholder tournament events with clickable cards and switches to a detail view when an event is selected.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, new feature requests, and overall state for the image gallery project.
